articles.author: M Divya
articles.title: Akasa Air welcomes new Boeing 737 MAX 8-200, becomes first airline in Asia to do so | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Akasa Air claims to be the first airline in Asia to induct a B737-8-200 aircraft. The 20th aircraft is registered as VT-YAV, which landed in Bengaluru International Airport on August 1 at 9:31 am and received a ceremonial welcome.
articles.content: Indias youngest and greenest carrier, Akasa Air, has welcomed the countrys first Boeing 737 MAX 8-200 type aircraft on August 1. Akasa Air claims to have become the first airline in Asia to induct B7… [+1873 chars]
